attributes.action: provide teachers with free ICT equipment, supplies and internet access to use at home for essential school work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently most teachers have to pay for their own internet access, home computer, printer consumables, paper etc. to plan and prepare lessons at home and do other pupil related tasks.  There is considerable pressure on teachers to use technology to improve teaching and learning, these essential things should be provided free of charge.  Teachers could then be charged for the amount they use this equipment for their personal use.  Technology/software is available to monitor this and charge teachers accordingly.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ICT4Teachers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
